org.netbeans.spi.java.project.support

Class ProjectPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.spi.java.project.support.ProjectPlatform

  • public final class ProjectPlatform
extends Object
    A factory for transient JavaPlatform defined within a project.
    Since:
    1.66

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JavaPlatform forProject(Project owner, PropertyEvaluator eval, String platformType)
      Creates a transient JavaPlatform defined in given Project.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • forProject

        @CheckForNull
public static JavaPlatform forProject(@NonNull
                                                    Project owner,
                                                    @NonNull
                                                    PropertyEvaluator eval,
                                                    @NonNull
                                                    String platformType)
        Creates a transient JavaPlatform defined in given Project.
        Parameters:
        owner - the project to return the JavaPlatform for
        eval - property evaluator
        platformType - the type of the platform, eg. "j2se"
        Returns:
        a JavaPlatform for given project or null when platform cannot be created
